jump_scares.spoiler: Karen looks outside through a gap in the wall and is attacked by an infected
An infected breaks through a wall in front of Alice and the boy as they try to escape
A now infected man turns around and hisses at the remaining survivors
Don recalls how his wife died and there is an abrupt flashback to earlier scenes of chaos
There is another abrupt flashback to Alice screaming for help
Doyle sneaks up and scares Flynn
Doyle scares Flynn again
Andy has a nightmare about his mother
Tammy screams as she grabs a key from a skeleton
An infected jumps at a soldier
An infected soldier bursts through a door and slams into a glass wall in front of Tammy and Andy. [Video]
Infected Don hisses and jumps at the door in front of Andy
An infected jumps up at the car window
Tammy walks into something and screams
Scarlet suddenly sees infected Don through her rifle’s night vision lens
Infected Don comes into view behind Andy
The scene abruptly cuts to the infected running through the streets of Paris
An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela
Edwin, now an infected, suddenly turns around and snarls
Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door
An infected appears and attacks a soldier
A monkey appears and shrieks
A sound of banging against a pipe wakes Sarah up
Sarah is suddenly grabbed by a man from behind and dragged away
Sarah fires the gun
An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo
SpongeJohn appears from the darkness
As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
A silhouette runs past the camera
Gabe gets grabbed from behind while playing rock, paper, scissors
A severed head is found by Eben on a pole
A body flies through the window
John gets slashed by a hand
Wilson gets grabbed by a vampire
A girl runs through the doorway
A vampire jumps from the air
One of the group members gets attacked by a vampire
A body falls down from the stairwell next to a group of people on the ground floor
Someone runs through the door space
One of the infected slams against the glass door from the other side
The little girl attacks the police officer
An infected lady jumps into the centre of the hallway
A hand bursts through some glass grabbing one of the men
The light on the camera turns on revealing an infected person
The attic door suddenly opens
The camera spins around in the attic where a boy’s face appears. [Video]
Ángela and Pablo try and sneak past an infected person however they make a noise and it turns around
Ángela screams as she is suddenly dragged away
A chimpanzee makes a loud noise
Jim sets off a car alarm
An infected individual jumps through a window
An infected screams from somewhere below Jim and Selena
Jim wakes up in a nightmare
A crow starts cawing loudly
An infected jumps on the truck that Henry is trying to start
One of the soldiers turns around and sees an infected at the window, who then jumps through the window and attacks the soldier
An infected tries to break into the room where Jim and a soldier are
An infected breaks through the back window of the car and attacks Henry
Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
A neomorph opens its mouth and violently attacks Rosenthal
Oram suddenly shoots the neomorph
The facehugger jumps out at Oram
Blood explodes out of Oram’s torso
David disables Walter
A facehugger jumps out at Cole
The rover door is suddenly opened after the children question where the adults are
Burke puts his face near a tank when suddenly one of the creatures slams against the inside wall of the tank
The team walk through a corridor when a silhouette runs past the screen
One of the crew members finds a body which suddenly opens its eyes when its head is lifted
An alien attached to the wall jumps off to grab one of the crew members
An alien pokes its head through the door before the group begin to leave
Ellen emerges from underneath the bed and is suddenly attacked by a small alien
After setting off the sprinklers, Ellen is jumped at again by the small alien
One of the men looks into the vents and spots a group of aliens approaching
Pvt. Vasquez looks at an upwards opening in the vent and spots an alien coming down
The pair start to go up the elevator when an alien reaches in
When the crew land, Bishop is attacked by an alien
Ellen’s ankle is grabbed as she tries to climb the ladder
The alien’s tongue comes out of its mouth and slams into the glass barrier
An alien hand grabs Dr. Gediman and pulls him into the hole
A broken hose drops down and starts hissing behind Elgyn. [Video]
An apparently dead man suddenly jumps up and yells
A Face Hugger jumps on to Ripley’s face
Purvis is suddenly shot
The alien snaps at Ripley
An alien roars from behind Call
The dying alien suddenly roars at Call once more
Beau is attacked by one of the creatures (while we get some warning the attack is quite loud and violent)
Regan knocks over a lamp during a game of monopoly and the ensuing loud noise during a previously quiet scene may be quite startling for some viewers
There is a loud bang on the roof of the house
As Lee listens by a window, a raccoon suddenly screeches and runs past
A raccoon is suddenly attacked by one of the creatures
As Regan is about to descend the stairs, Lee grabs her and pulls her back
Marcus walks past an old man who is watching him in the background
A creature walks past the doorway above the stairs
The creature makes a loud noise
Evelyn puts a bloodied hand on the shower window startling Lee
As Regan goes to pick up the torch, Marcus grabs her wrist
Marcus falls through a metal door and lands in the grain silo
The creature drops down into the grain silo beside Regan
After a period of silence we see the creature outside the car, the creature then breaks through the window with a loud crash
A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
An emergency vehicle rushes past
A woman’s face appears through shelving
A woman grabs Chris from behind
A zombie man jumps into frame
The camera pans back to Jonathan. A zombie screams beside Him
A zombie grabs man from the shadows
Eric pretends to be pulled into the water to scare Cash as a joke
After hearing a splashing noise, Eric and Cash turn around to see something in the water leaping straight at them
The crocodile suddenly drags the floating dead body underwater
Something touches Cash under the water, startling him
Yolanda hears a splash and turns around in fright, shining the light on the dead body
While looking around for the crocodile, it suddenly appears right next to Cash and bites him
The crocodile suddenly jumps out of the water onto the rock
As Viktor looks around the water with a flashlight, the crocodile suddenly jumps out and attacks him
The crocodile jumps out of the water towards the car
An apparent earthquake causes the camera to shake violently
The monster’s tail slams into the bridge
The monster’s foot comes down in front of Rob
An air-conditioning unit falls off the building
A parasite drops down from the ceiling
The monster suddenly lunges at the helicopter
A bomb hits while Rob and Beth are hiding under the bridge causing debris to cover the camera
One of the killerbots pierces through the poster with its arm
A phone suddenly starts ringing, startling Mike
Something falls from the ceiling towards Alison
A killerbot appears right behind Alison
A screeching cat jumps out in front of Alison
An enraged man comes out of the darkness
A dog barks
The boy on the swing suddenly turns around and lunges at the group
A man snarls behind Clay
Clay opens a door and a woman lunges at him
During a quiet establishing shot of a stately room, a man suddenly falls through the roof
Danny suddenly falls through the ice
As Ben says “I have the antidote” he is suddenly tackled by Jason
As Zoe says “Ben, get up”, she is suddenly attacked by the Game-master
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
A wolf suddenly appears in front of Dan
A sudden shotgun blast may startle some viewers
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie
A zombie appears in front of Ann as she flees the house
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
A deer runs in front of Robert’s car
As Robert is about to shoot a deer, a lion suddenly pounces on it. [Video]
During a flashback, an infected person suddenly lunges at the car window while Robert and his wife are talking. [Video]
An infected rat lunges at the wall of its container
Robert shines his light on a group of infected people
An infected person lunges at Robert
The apparently unconscious infected person suddenly jumps up on the table
An infected person suddenly tackles Robert
Several of the infected burst into the lab
After a tense scene the spaceship explodes mid sentence
During a dream, Travis’s grandfather suddenly coughs up blood
There is a loud knock on the door during a tense scene
A bullet narrowly misses the car
One of the windows in Paul’s truck is blown out
As Travis approaches the door there is a loud noise from the other side
Footage of a woman running from the killers (starts with a classic jump scare sound)
A bit more footage of the killers’ victim (also starting loudly, to startle the audience)
The same victim crying for help as she’s surrounded by her attackers
Justine is startled by a fellow student near the lockers area
A car engine revs, accompanied by a jump scare sound, as Justine exits a store
As Justine is driving and has her eyes on the road again: a jump scare sound when she notices a car motionless in the middle of the road
Another jump scare sound as Justine is walking down a hallway and the lights go out for a moment
A mystery person walks past one of the dorm rooms in the dark (accompanied by a jump scare sound effect)
The woman with the hoodie (that Justine met at the store) suddenly appears in front of Justine
One of the killers shows up onscreen
The campus security guard is attacked by one of the killers
Violet (hoodie woman) jumps in front of Justine
Another member of the group of killers appears in the hallway as Justine is running away
One of the killers “jumps in” a static shot, attempting to surprise Justine (this is one of the loudest jump scare sounds of the movie)
Justine’s friend Scott appears from an adjacent room and wielding a shotgun (yet another classic jump scare sound effect)
Scott is grabbed by one of the killers as soon as he opens the front door of his own place
(Yet) another jump scare sound effect as it’s shown that one of the killers is watching Justine from a distance
Justine reaches the edge of a rooftop and when she turns around: all the killers have caught up to her
One of the killers rushes past Aaron’s car
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away
Reggie’s coworker opens the door, followed by a cut to a zombified man attacking him
Reggie turns around to leave and the zombified man suddenly jumps up from behind some boxes
A door slams shut
There is a sudden bang on the door
The small lizard is suddenly grabbed and eaten by a different, much larger type of lizard
When Jonas looks to his left, the megalodon suddenly appears next to the submersible
Someone grabs Jonas by the shoulder
A previously unseen large eel suddenly leaps at the character’s helmet, shown from his POV
A shoal of fish startles the characters
A lizard suddenly appears in front of Jonas, shown from his POV, and lunges at him
The megalodon rams the glass wall behind the speaking character, shattering it
A megalodon suddenly appears and swallows the boat with the mercenaries
Something rams the boat, startling its passengers
The scene abruptly cuts to Corporal Bower struggling in his hyper-sleep chamber
A hyper-sleep chamber drops down, accompanied by a loud noise
Bower shines his torch on a dead person hanging by some rope. [Video]
The mystery girl attacks Bower

Something runs past Bower
A monster tries to attack Bower through a grate
A child’s face appears beside Bower during a scene transition

The monsters start screaming from above Bower
A monster lunges at Bower

A fish suddenly swims by
Clayton suddenly pops up from under the water
Travis’s handless bloodied arm breaks through the van window

A piranha jumps out of the water directly at the camera
A piranha jumps out of the lake to chase the girls – literally

A huge piranha jumps straight towards the camera
A piranha gobbles up another piranha

A piranha jumps out of the bathtub directly towards the camera
A bloodied and mutilated hand reaches up out of the water
The dock collapses causing Sheriff Forester to fall into the water
A mutilated dead body suddenly pops up out of the water onto Sheriff Forester’s back
A fish embryo inside an egg suddenly starts moving
A Piranha suddenly bites the diver’s hand
Piranhas suddenly appear, chasing a girl in the water
The girl who was parasailing is lifted out of the water revealing her missing legs and mutilated body
A girl being carried out of the water, suddenly splits in two

The man starts moving

The man is grabbed by the head

There is a sudden scene change to a close-up of a pop tart popping out of a toaster
A homeless man’s face suddenly transforms into a disfigured eyeless head

A figure crosses in front of Harry as he opens a door
A man turns around to reveal his eyes and mouth are sewn shut

There is a loud metallic clanking as a door opens

Vincent is grabbed by The Missionary

The spider-like creature attacks Heather

Leonard rushes out of the darkness at Heather
A prisoner grabs at Heather through some bars. [Video]
The doors burst open as Vincent is wheeled in on a hospital bed
Heather looks to her left and sees a man in a gas mask beside her

Noel surprises Shaun
Shaun walks into Yvonne
Shaun and Ed turn around and see another zombie in the back yard
Pete’s hand reaches out from behind the shower curtain

Shaun’s group runs into another group of survivors

A creepy doll is in the mirror when the lights turn on
Jasmine suddenly wakes up and grabs Bart’s hand
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home
A man knocks on a car window, startling the occupant
A woman’s head suddenly explodes
A man’s head explodes
There are several loud gunshots
Mike is hit over the head with a fire extinguisher as he descends some stairs
A woman is shot in the head (followed by several more people over the next minute or so)
A man’s head explodes unexpectedly
A man is shot (somewhat unexpectedly)

A metal rod smashes through the window during one of Sarah’s dreams. [Video]
A large number of bats fly out in front of the girls
Juno jumps down in front of Sarah
Sarah turns around and Juno is right behind her
A crawler is seen standing behind the group through the night vision camera. [Video]
The girls run into a crawler that screams at them. [Video]
Sarah hallucinates her daughter, however when her head turns she becomes one of the creatures from the cave. [Video]
Holly’s body is dropped in front of Sarah, the creatures then proceed to eat the body

Beth sticks her hand in the air and calls for Sarah

The ambulance medic falls onto the windscreen

The monster slams into the side of the ambulance as it drives away

The creature suddenly tackles Kathy
